main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing an oval-shaped object emitting green, yellow, and orange colors over Asuncion, Paraguay on 20 February 1948.
interesting points: Reports were gathered from various individuals including a newspaper, leading to different interpretations of the object as a meteor or a machine., The object was described to have a tail approximately three feet long., Witnesses reported the object traveling from west to east at a speed less than that of an airplane., There was a coincidence in the date and time of sighting among multiple witnesses., The police concluded that the object may have been a meteor but could not assert this as a proven fact.
sighted object: oval-shaped object emitting green, yellow, and orange colors
witnesses: Mrs. Agustina VAJAGOS de Paiva, an employee of the Bank of Paraguay, a radio reporter, and other individuals visiting the area
